text: This is a list of airports in the nation state of Solomon Islands, sorted by location. Other airports within the Solomon Islands archipelago but outside of Solomon Islands can be found at list of airports in Papua New Guinea __TOC__ == Airports == Airport names shown in bold indicate the airport has scheduled service on commercial airlines. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font- size:95%;" |- valign=baseline ! style="text-align:left; white-space:nowrap;" | Location !
